entry.title: Audio Video Conference
entry.summary:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

You can hold audio/video conferences using Skypes http://blogs.skype.com/2013/06/18/conference-calling-with-skype-quick-easy-and-cost-effective/

entry.content:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

You can hold audio/video conferences using Skypes http://blogs.skype.com/2013/06/18/conference-calling-with-skype-quick-easy-and-cost-effective/

UberConference is a good (free for up to 10 callers) but for US only?
